description:
In this training you will learn more about how to use it effectively to build relationships, add value and convert your passion into profits.

Instagram has over 150 million users on the platform, 16 billion photos shared, and 1 billion likes happening each day, the photo-sharing and editing platform is one of the most engaging channels on social media. With over 150 million active users on Instagram make sure you are one of them!

In this course I will show you specifically how to:

1. Create custom text in Instagram for your pictures for business use. These are strategies and tips you have never seen before.

2. 3 creative ways to use video in Instagram for your business.

3. Use of effective hashtags

4. Build a following

5. How to build a bio that rocks!

The training will be done directly from an iPad.

Please note: This is NOT a step-by-step beginner training that will teach you how to take pictures for Instagram. In this course you will learn how to harness the power of Instagram for your business with a focus on building a community.

I will share apps that I use, how to build an effective bio, how to find people to follow and more! Training does include a recording of the training and access to the course "How to Use Instagram Video for Business and Building a Brand."

Visit me on Instagram http://instagram.com/montinaportis and let's connect!
title: Instagram Training for Beginners
